modName: Dawnguard Hoods and Light Helmet Replacer
summary: Gunmar now stocks light and heavy Dawnguard Hoods.
descriptionHtml:
[center]ï»¿[SIZE=7][font=Impact][color=#f1c232][b]Dawnguard Hoods[/b][/color][/font][/SIZE][/center]
[line]
[b][color=#f1c232][size=3]Description:[/size]
[/color][/b]So, the Dawnguard Light Helmet looks horrible, atleast in my opinion. This mod simply adds an alternative, or a replacement.
If the non replacement option is chosen, the two hoods can be bought from Gunmar. They have stats similar to their light and heavy helmet counterparts.

If the replacement option is used, the light Dawnguard helmet is replaced with the hood, and the hoods are added to Gunmar's stock, as with the none replacer.

The version you wish to use is basically chosen by choosing the "Dawnguard Hoods.esp" for non replacer, or "Dawnguard Hoods and Replacer.esp" to replace the light helm.
[line]
So GamerPoets made a very flattering video about this hood. Thanks, man! Never thought this would get a review, let alone a video review. Thanks again.
[youtube]JzEivNOVzqg[/youtube]
[line]
[color=#f1c232][size=3][b]Stuffs:[/b][/size][/color]
I made this for myself, because I found myself unable to wear the Dawnguard Light Helmet without vomiting. I decided to share it, because reasons. I'm not great with textures, but seeing as this was a personal project, that's ok.
Ok Bye! [b][color=#e06666]<3[/color][/b]
author: Adinirth
